entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 25 mm over western sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
